assetProfile.address2: A-18, First Floor Okhla Industrial Area Phase II
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: GE T&D India Limited engages in building power transmission and distribution infrastructure in India and internationally. The company offers power electronics equipment, including high voltage direct current (DC), flexible alternate current transmission systems, and industrial DC substations. It also provides transformers, gas insulated substations, air insulated substations, and capacitors and reactors, as well as control panels and flexible AC transmission systems. In addition, the company offers turnkey projects and consulting; electrical balance of plant; high voltage substations; maintenance support; and asset management services. Further, it offers digital software solutions, including energy management and market management, distribution and outage management, and virtual power plant-DERMS; edge to control infrastructure, fleet level analysis, optimization analytics, and asset performance management; protection and control, substation automation, and communications; and remote monitoring and diagnostics, and geospatial and mobile solutions. The company was formerly known as Alstom T&D India Limited and changed its name to GE T&D India Limited in August 2016. The company was incorporated in 1957 and is based in New Delhi, India. GE T&D India Limited is a subsidiary of Grid Equipments Private Limited.
